comments:
I am using the stable build M5 against a CVS server on Linux (v1.10.7).

The checkout and commit operations work fine with one exception: when
trying to compare contents of the changed files, the remote version is
displayed as empty. But if I continue and checkout such "empty" file, the
local file is updated properly. 
If I try to open such file from the Resource History view, internal error
is reported (the dump is enclosed below).

If I use "Get Contents" in the Resource History, the local file is replaced 
with empty content.

The problem also occurs with stable build 20020321, but not with 20020125 (I 
guess earlier versions also work fine).

Internal Error dump:

We do not support CVS versions previous to 1.11.1p1.

If the problem exists in that or 1.11.2, please reopen.
